title: More tricks than we have (TEFC)
brief_description: An introduction to how theatre in education works. Begins with a group of actors from Toe Truck Theatre and their director in the early stages of devising a play. We see the performance and follow up discussions and workshops. Based on the play “Year 9 are animals”, which tells the story of an enthusiastic first year teacher and the problems he encounters.
